bibl.author: Walt Whitman
bibl.title: Walt Whitman to Hannah Heyde, 4 February 1891
bibl.orgName: The Charles E. Feinberg Collection of the Papers of Walt Whitman, 1839â€“1919, Library of Congress, Washington, D.C.

body.p: Cold & sunny here—Lou was in this mn'g—all are well as usual—Jess is getting along at St Louis—nothing very new or different—Ed is the same at Blackwood—Have not heard f'm Mary lately—A pretty bad fortnight with me that last but might be worse—am sitting here as usual as I write this—Dr Bucke is quite sick abed—Love to you sister dear—$2 enclosed—Sun out shining beautifully the 1 o'c whistle just blown
